content:
Yes, there are several sustainable fashion brands that offer inclusive sizing as well. Here are a few:

1. Reformation - they offer sizes from XS to 3XL and are committed to sustainable and ethical practices throughout their production process.

2. Girlfriend Collective - they offer size ranges from XXS to 6XL and use recycled materials to create their activewear.

3. Mara Hoffman - they offer sizes up to 3X and are committed to sustainable and ethical practices throughout their production process.

4. Pact - they offer sizes up to 4X and produce clothing made from organic cotton and other sustainable materials.

5. Eileen Fisher - they offer sizes up to 3X and have a focus on ethical and sustainable fashion production.

These are just a few examples of sustainable fashion brands that offer inclusive sizing options, but there are many more brands that are making similar efforts as well.
